Package cryptoAnalyzer.selection

Class SelectCryptocurrency

java.lang.Object
cryptoAnalyzer.selection.SelectionObserver
cryptoAnalyzer.selection.SelectCryptocurrency
public class SelectCryptocurrency
extends SelectionObserver
inherit SelectObserver class, use Observer design pattern This class represents the function that user selects cryptocurrencies to fetch and visualize data for
Since:
2021-12-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ruyi Jin

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear()

    • add

      public void add​(java.lang.String subject)
      when a cryptocurrency is selected from the drop down menu, add successfully if it is in the available kist
      Parameters:
      subject - is the cryptocurrency which is chosen from the drop down menu and will be check if it is valid to fetch data if not available, display a warning message and fail to add that crypto into the list which contains the cryptos to be fetched

    • remove

      public void remove​(java.lang.String subject)
      remove cryptos from the list
      Parameters:
      subject - the cryptocurrency which is chosen from the drop down menu to be removed

    • update

      public void update​(java.lang.String subject)
      override the update method from SelectionObsever class
      Specified by:
      update in class SelectionObserver

    • getCryptoStringList

      public java.lang.String[] getCryptoStringList()
      getter method: get the list of cryptocurrencies that are chosen to be analyze
      Returns:
      the list of cryptocurrencies that are chosen to be fetched and visualize data for

    • check

      public boolean check​(java.lang.String subject)
      check if the cryptocurrency selected from the drop down menu is in the available crypto list or not
      Parameters:
      subject - the latest cryptocurrency selected from the drop down menu
      Returns:
      true if the crypto is in the available list, return false otherwise.
